participants.name: Richard Pelaia
participants.title: Sr Mgr, Talent Acquisition at QuintilesIMS

messages.message:
Delivery excellence opportunity

Dear Brian, 

I was asked by our VP of Delivery to see if you would be interested in helping our delivery teams becoming more effective. The role is implementing Delivery Excellence for Technology Solutions in the US Business Unit.

You would work with end users in to troubleshoot problems. Create reports & dashboards to help Delivery Leadership understand the current state of their business. Lead meetings with key stakeholders to review reports & dashboards.

Email Richard.pelaia@quintilesims.com with times you are available for a call.

Richard Pelaia
8606551357 | Richard.Pelaia@quintilesims.com

That sounds so fun! I've been wanting to get in to management. I believe that through personal analytics, we can together finally answer the question, is an employee worth their weight in gold? Does an employee on an individual level make the company more money than what they spend on that worker?
